item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: It can be tough sometimes, but I'm hoping that it gets more fun once the work stress wears off!
item.content:encoded: It can be tough sometimes, but I’m hoping that it gets more fun once the work stress wears off!

item.title: By: gekkoe
item.dc:creator: gekkoe
item.description: Indeed Ben. You're hardly slacking with that schedule. We can only do what we can. I'm betting the hard work pays off... Hopefully it's fun too.
item.content:encoded:
Indeed Ben. You’re hardly slacking with that schedule. We can only do what we can. I’m betting the hard work pays off…
Hopefully it’s fun too.

item.title: By: gekkoe
item.dc:creator: gekkoe
item.description: I just started AYD. Loving it so far. One of the great things about being a bit weaker player (8-9k or so) is that progress can come so quickly with the introduction of some key ideas, and In-seong has some very good ideas, as you know. :) I feel I've already gained a stone or two after only 12 days. Granted, I've watched and re-watched a lot of lessons in that time, but still, that's a great result imo. Now to stabilize my game some. It can be rather...erratic in terms of strength. The cost is pretty heavy, but well....I don't buy cable tv. By the way, as you may recall, I found out about AYD from your site. Thanks for the useful tip!
item.content:encoded:
I just started AYD. Loving it so far.
One of the great things about being a bit weaker player (8-9k or so) is that progress can come so quickly with the introduction of some key ideas, and In-seong has some very good ideas, as you know. ðŸ™‚
I feel I’ve already gained a stone or two after only 12 days. Granted, I’ve watched and re-watched a lot of lessons in that time, but still, that’s a great result imo.
Now to stabilize my game some. It can be rather…erratic in terms of strength.
The cost is pretty heavy, but well….I don’t buy cable tv.
By the way, as you may recall, I found out about AYD from your site. Thanks for the useful tip!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Thanks for the encouragement man. Now I just need to find a way to play more consistently and then I think I'll have something solid to work with!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the encouragement man. Now I just need to find a way to play more consistently and then I think I’ll have something solid to work with!

item.title: By: Devin Flake
item.dc:creator: Devin Flake
item.description: Hmm - I think you're doing pretty good with your current training regime. You're progress may be slower than desired but its still progress.
item.content:encoded: Hmm – I think you’re doing pretty good with your current training regime. You’re progress may be slower than desired but its still progress.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Hi Logan! I'm glad that my blog has been an enjoyable experience for you. It means a lot to me to get feedback from the readers. And if there's anything you would like to see here or if you have any questions, please feel free to reach out at any time!
item.content:encoded: Hi Logan! I’m glad that my blog has been an enjoyable experience for you. It means a lot to me to get feedback from the readers. And if there’s anything you would like to see here or if you have any questions, please feel free to reach out at any time!

item.title: By: Logan Graba
item.dc:creator: Logan Graba
item.description: Hello Ben. My name is Logan and I just wanted to say how much I've been enjoying looking through your site. Thanks for taking the time to expound upon the concepts of Go and your progression!
item.content:encoded: Hello Ben. My name is Logan and I just wanted to say how much I’ve been enjoying looking through your site. Thanks for taking the time to expound upon the concepts of Go and your progression!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I absolutely agree about the value. Alas, part of my issue is the inability to commit the proper time I would like to it in order to get the full value of it. Towards the end of the season, I barely had enough time to simply play my games and even failed to watch the review of my last game. Pretty sad huh?
item.content:encoded: I absolutely agree about the value. Alas, part of my issue is the inability to commit the proper time I would like to it in order to get the full value of it. Towards the end of the season, I barely had enough time to simply play my games and even failed to watch the review of my last game. Pretty sad huh?
